alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 3:07PM PST until March 12 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 south of Gold Hill, including the cities of Eagle Point, White City, Medford, Ashland, Talent, Phoenix, and Jacksonville. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to be strongest between 1 pm and 6 pm pst. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
